Pre-Game Insights: India's captain Rohit Sharma performed well against Ireland, stitching together an impressive second wicket stand with Rishabh Pant.
Pakistan's batting struggled against the USA, with only Shadab Khan managing a decent innings.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match is held at the Nassau County International Cricket Stadium in New York.
The pitch has produced low-scoring matches, providing help to fast bowlers.
